name: HistologicalPlacentalExaminationVS
title: ValueSet - Histological Placental Examination
description: This valueset contains codes to represent histological placental examinations. This valueset is based on [PHVS_HistologicalPlacentalExamination_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=82BF4C7F-D01F-4019-A1E1-9F7CAACB7FC6)
